title: US elections: If Trump focuses on this key issue, then he will win the US elections, says longtime GOP pollster - The Economic Times
text: A longtime GOP pollster Frank Luntz has openly claimed that Donald Trump needs to focus on some of the key American issues in recent times, and promise the nation that he will work on them after coming to power. Only then can the former US President be elected to the White House by Americans, who are this time, searching for the candidate who will take forward the true vision of America. US elections: The new MAGA goal should be focusing on pressing issuesUnited States is plagued with a number of crisis at this point, and one which tops it all off is the impending recession and its effect on the US economy. The stock markets and jobs data have already started reacting to recession fears, and even though inflation levels are falling to the normal baseline, recession fears is being driven up by majority of other factors including increasing unemployment rates. The US Fed Reserve went as far as introducing a whopping 50 bps rate cut but that could stop the bleeding for now, and if Trump really comes to power, he has to immediately begin planning necessary remedies to counter the root causes of an incoming recession. Moreover, agricultural reforms, gun laws, and abortion issues are also some of the leading issues being talked about during the election race, and if these are catered to, or even hinted at by Trump, there is a major chance that the confidence of the Americans would stand behind him. Will Harris be able to win using these issues in the US elections?If Harris manages to pick these key election themes, she also has a chance to be on the 'driver's seat' for the elections, but it must also be noted that Trump is a tried and tested candidate, and if he promises deliverables on the same issues, Americans have a chance of trusting him more. FAQs: Is Donald Trump focusing on key election themes for 2024?For the 2024 US elections in November, Donald Trump is seriously working on the key American issues, including agricultural reforms, economic plans and more, as per reports. Will Donald Trump be able to win the US elections 2024?Donald Trump has a fair chance of winning the US elections 2024, only if he managed to keep his focus on key election themes and real American issues, feel pollsters.
